reviews.review_msg: You won't find a prof who cares more about her students or works harder than Sabrina. The content isn't terribly difficult, but there is a lot of work involved. Plenty of opportunities for extra credit and she will look over your paper for detailed feedback if you submit it 2 weeks early. She really does everything she can to help you succeed.

get ready for a 4000 words essay. Really nice prof. If you put in the time to work and ask her questions, she is accommodating and accessible. Only take this class if you are good at English. Extremely strict on grammar. One of the best lecturer I have had, really engaging and fun. Exams are fair. Take this class if you want to have fun.
